name: Spindigo Bones and The Escape From The Golden City
name_original: Spindigo Bones and The Escape From The Golden City
description:
A short platformer made for Mini Jam 85 - Gold

Controls are inside the opening screen of the game

Use your spin jump, and the recoil of your Uzi to navigate your way out of the city of Gold before poor Spindigo Bones dies again!

The devs best time was escaping with 31 seconds to spare.

Music was made using Beepbox
Some art is from Kenny Art Assets
Fonts are from https://w.itch.io/world-of-fonts and https://managore.itch.io/m3x6
